# Contributing to node-keytar

Thank you for your interest in contributing to this project!

This repository is primarily maintained for consumption by [github/copilot-cli](https://github.com/github/copilot-cli). As such, contributions may or may not be accepted depending on whether they align with the needs of that project.

## Before You Contribute

- **Issues**: Feel free to open an issue to report bugs or suggest improvements, but please understand that not all requests may be addressed.
- **Pull Requests**: Before investing significant effort in a pull request, we recommend opening an issue first to discuss whether the change is likely to be accepted.

Thank you for your understanding!
